ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Next question, what to pursue?
ygData.msgSnippet: Congrats on the levels :) Personally, I don t think you should worry about kiting too much, unless its fear-kiting.  I know lots of bards that swear by
ygData.messageBody:
Congrats on the levels :)

Personally, I don't think you should worry about kiting too much, unless its
fear-kiting. I know lots of bards that swear by chain-kiting but I think
its a waste of time. If your brass skill is decent you won't have any
problem keeping a high blue mob feared... sure it will take some time to
kill but its actaully faster than chain-kiting. If you find you spend most
of your time with groups though, don't worry about this too much even. I
would focus more on the charm/mes method of crowd control more - its very
useful.

Gear wise, you should go for the DE mask. Mostly because Lower Guk Assasin
room is kickass exp in the 30s. The Lambent quests should be all VERY easy
for you to do yourself with a group. You just have to convince them that
going to West Karana is FUN.

Tani, 58th Bardette
Halana, 60th Shaman
Solusek Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Katye and Brandon [mailto:landmax13@...]
Sent: Sunday, December 30, 2001 4:18 PM
To: Bard List
Subject: [eqbards] Next question, what to pursue?


OK, just got out of 30 hell.. bound in FV, been hunting in OT with
groups. Training up my brass (excellent, finally) on the docks at night
when finished adventuring....

Now, I am a pretty kicking battle bard in a group. Fighting and twisting
Im good at , have been gifted some good gear, armor and weapons ... good
enough at least. Have been gifted MM drums, SS boots and Gauntlet.... so
I do just fine.

But, am weak on crowd control (no cha gear yet) and kiting. Very weak on
kiting...

I know I need to train kiting and will be doing that.

Gear wise, I'm thinking about starting to try for lambent stuff. Read a
guide about being a low level and sneaking around and asking for no drops
from high levels to get the gear, and considering that.

I feel a high priority for me is a dark elf mask as well. Has good cha
(13) and dark elf should not be KOS with guards in OT...

don't have good instruments other than drums. Have a minotaur horn for
wind, but no special lutes.

Any suggestions, itemwise?

Thanks again,

Raub Zaumbie
31st lvl songster
E. Marr server
